About Us
learn
ABOUT US
Set on the lush grounds of a historic pineapple plantation hugging Florida Bay, this secluded 200-room resort offers the rare sophistication of modern comfort in harmony with nature. A nod to the Keys’ seafaring past, our contemporary coastal resort pulls influence from its surroundings, weaving a love for this land, the ocean, and sustainability into everything we do, from onsite programming to local partnerships. With a focus on curated experiences and finely crafted island adventures, Baker’s Cay beckons guests to embrace this inspired natural setting we call home.
New suites coming soon!
Experience exceptional amenities and thoughtfully curated accommodations in our new Palm and Paradise Suites.
Discover Our New Suites
Palm Suite and Paradise Suites
Escape to your perfect island retreat with our Paradise Suite and Palm Suite, each offering 700 square feet of thoughtfully designed comfort. Ideal for couples or families, both suites feature a private king bedroom, spacious living areas with sleeper sofas, and spa-inspired bathrooms with soaking tubs and double vanities.
Be the first to stay!
About Us
VIEW ALL
Conservation
We weave sustainability into every element of Baker’s Cay. Enthusiastically embracing our role as stewards of the delicate Florida Keys ecosystem, we seek to create harmony between our guests and the earth with initiatives focused on responsible consumption, waste reduction, and local resourcing.
Explore our ethos
FAQ
A Vacation in paradise should be effortless and worry-free!
Which is why we’ve collected our most commonly asked questions about staying at Baker’s Cay into one, easy to find list to help you plan your vacation.
View FAQ
Our Story
A true tropical oasis, this place we call home was once a sprawling 15-acre pineapple plantation owned by our namesake, Captain Ben Baker. A golden beacon of hospitality and warmth, Baker’s Cay continues to pay homage to the bold history of Key Largo and the daring spirit of its settlers.
Explore our Story
your stories
#atthecay

NEW SUITES
Discover the ultimate island escape in our new suites. Each spacious 700-square-foot retreat is designed for relaxation and style, featuring a private king bedroom, generous living space with a sleeper sofa, and a spa-inspired bathroom complete with a soaking tub and double vanity.
Get an Inside Look at Our New Suites
